name: Call for papers for Codemotion Madrid 2015
description:
Codemotion Madrid IV edition will be held in **November 27- 28** in 	[Universidad CEU San Pablo, Campus de Montepr√≠ncipe](http://www.uspceu.com/es/facultades-escuelas/escuela-politecnica-superior/index.php). Send us your talk or workshop and be a part of the biggest IT event in Spain!

Talks must be 40 minutes and workshops 1 hour and 45 minutes in length. Please use the field `Comments` if you have any specific requirement for your presentation.

**This C4P closes on July 5** and we will take about one month to create the agenda, with the collaboration of our experts and communities. We will also launch a survey to ask the people what they prefer to see in the next Codemotion and the results will help us to make a better selection. We won't use your personal information for other purposes.

**Codemotion Madrid won't pay for any talk, but will give the speakers coming from abroad a partial refund for the travel expenses**.

Please e-mail us at [info@codemotion.es](mailto:info@codemotion.es) for any doubt.

event.name: Call for papers for Codemotion Madrid 2015
